com.github.westonpace.jayvee.image
Interface OutOfBoundsAccessStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
OutOfBoundsAccessStrategy.ExtendEdgesStrategy
public interface OutOfBoundsAccessStrategy

Defines what to do when a user attempts to access a pixel value that is outside of the legal range. Several common out of bounds strategies exist and they have different advantages for different situations.

Nested Class Summary
static class OutOfBoundsAccessStrategy.ExtendEdgesStrategy
           Accesses pixels beyond the edge of an image by assuming the edgemost pixels simply extend into infinity.
 
Method Summary
 double get(int x, int y, int b, Image img)
          Retrieves a value from an image when the value does not lay on the actual image itself.
 

Method Detail

get

double get(int x,
           int y,
           int b,
           Image img)
Retrieves a value from an image when the value does not lay on the actual image itself.

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate of the desired pixel
y - The y coordinate of the desired pixel
b - The band containing the desired pixel
img - The image to access
Returns:
A pixel value that represents the given coordinates
